thread.title: How to Get Help With a Stock Buyback: Ask Blackstone

author: Paul J. Davies
title: How to Get Help With a Stock Buyback: Ask Blackstone
text:
There are easier ways of borrowing to fund a share buyback, but Thomson Reuters needed help.
The Canadian company is selling a majority stake in its financial information and terminals business to Blackstone and two co-investors in a $17 billion deal. This is no simple buyout, though. It is a piece of financial engineering that gives Blackstone an apparently cheap ticket to try and better manage a business that has stumbled in recent years.
